name: Dreamscape Endurance Race
description:
One lap!  One race!  How fast can you make it around?  Test your racing skills in this endurance challenge and see if you can beat your previous time (and others) by going another lap!  You can post your times below for others to see as well!   Any feedback is also greatly appreciated!  Hope you enjoy!

First place winner of Unity's Winter Is Here Challenge! 

https://connect.unity.com/challenges/winter-is-here-challenge

You can also play it on Unity Connect if you prefer!
https://connect.unity.com/p/endurance-race-1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
Level Design: Alejandro Haibi

Assets used are from : https://www.kenney.nl/ , and the base Unity assets that came  with the Micro Mod along with the base coding, minor tweaks added by myself
